languages.text: "В завещании наследником указан Фиделио, но..." {n}Капеллан вынимает из сумы внушительный свиток и рвет на клочки.{/n} "Денз всю жизнь плевал на законы, думаю, он бы понял".

traits.locale_text: "В завещании наследником указан Фиделио, но..." {n}Капеллан вынимает из сумы внушительный свиток и рвет на клочки.{/n} "Денз всю жизнь плевал на законы, думаю, он бы понял".
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

languages.text: "The name on the will is Fidelio, but..." {n}Chaplain pulls a hefty scroll out of his bag and tears it to shreds.{/n} "All his life, Denz spat on laws, I think he'd understand."

languages.text: “遗嘱上写的名字是菲迪奥，不过……”{n}牧师从包里掏出了一个厚厚的卷轴，把它撕成了碎片。{/n}“丹兹这辈子都在鄙视律法，我想他会理解的。”
languages.original_text: "The name on the will is Fidelio, but..." {n}Chaplain pulls a hefty scroll out of his bag and tears it to shreds.{/n} "All his life, Denz spat on laws, I think he'd understand."

traits.locale_text: “遗嘱上写的名字是菲迪奥，不过……”{n}牧师从包里掏出了一个厚厚的卷轴，把它撕成了碎片。{/n}“丹兹这辈子都在鄙视律法，我想他会理解的。”
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

languages.text: «El nombre que pone en el testamento es Fidelio, pero...». {n}El capellán saca un voluminoso pergamino de su bolsa y lo hace pedazos.{/n} «Denz escupió a las leyes toda su vida. Creo que lo entendería».
languages.original_text: "The name on the will is Fidelio, but..." {n}Chaplain pulls a hefty scroll out of his bag and tears it to shreds.{/n} "All his life, Denz spat on laws, I think he'd understand."

traits.locale_text: «El nombre que pone en el testamento es Fidelio, pero...». {n}El capellán saca un voluminoso pergamino de su bolsa y lo hace pedazos.{/n} «Denz escupió a las leyes toda su vida. Creo que lo entendería».
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

languages.text: 「遺書にはフィデリオという名前が書かれていますが…」{n}教戒官は長い巻物をバッグから取り出し、びりびりに破いた。{/n}「デンツは生涯、法律に唾を吐き続けてきたので理解してくれるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The name on the will is Fidelio, but..." {n}Chaplain pulls a hefty scroll out of his bag and tears it to shreds.{/n} "All his life, Denz spat on laws, I think he'd understand."

traits.locale_text: 「遺書にはフィデリオという名前が書かれていますが…」{n}教戒官は長い巻物をバッグから取り出し、びりびりに破いた。{/n}「デンツは生涯、法律に唾を吐き続けてきたので理解してくれるでしょう」
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

languages.text: "Der Name im Testament lautet Fidelio, aber ..." {n}Ordenspriester zieht eine dicke Schriftrolle aus seiner Tasche und zerreißt sie.{/n} "Denz hat sein ganzes Leben auf Gesetze gepfiffen, er würde es bestimmt verstehen."
languages.original_text: "The name on the will is Fidelio, but..." {n}Chaplain pulls a hefty scroll out of his bag and tears it to shreds.{/n} "All his life, Denz spat on laws, I think he'd understand."

traits.locale_text: "Der Name im Testament lautet Fidelio, aber ..." {n}Ordenspriester zieht eine dicke Schriftrolle aus seiner Tasche und zerreißt sie.{/n} "Denz hat sein ganzes Leben auf Gesetze gepfiffen, er würde es bestimmt verstehen."
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

languages.text: « Le testament est au nom de Fidélio, mais... » {n}Chapelain tire un lourd parchemin de son sac et le déchire sous les yeux médusés de l'assistance.{/n} « Denz a passé sa vie à cracher sur les lois. Je pense qu'il comprendrait. »
languages.original_text: "The name on the will is Fidelio, but..." {n}Chaplain pulls a hefty scroll out of his bag and tears it to shreds.{/n} "All his life, Denz spat on laws, I think he'd understand."

traits.locale_text: « Le testament est au nom de Fidélio, mais... » {n}Chapelain tire un lourd parchemin de son sac et le déchire sous les yeux médusés de l'assistance.{/n} « Denz a passé sa vie à cracher sur les lois. Je pense qu'il comprendrait. »
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

languages.text: "Vasiyette geçen isim, Fidelio ama..." {n}Papaz, çantasından kocaman bir tomar çıkarıp lime lime ediyor.{/n} "Denz, hayatı boyunca yasalara uymadı. Bence bize hak verecektir."
languages.original_text: "The name on the will is Fidelio, but..." {n}Chaplain pulls a hefty scroll out of his bag and tears it to shreds.{/n} "All his life, Denz spat on laws, I think he'd understand."

traits.locale_text: "Vasiyette geçen isim Fidelio ama..." {n}Papaz, çantasından kocaman bir kâğıt çıkarıp lime lime ediyor.{/n} "Denz hayatı boyunca yasalara uymadı. Bence bize hak verecektir."
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain
